mapper.sql: ui.*, org.ID as oid , org.OrganizationName as orgname , org.RoleName as orgrole
mapper.select:
select
from UserInfo ui inner join UserOrganization ug on ui.UserID = ug.UserID inner join Organization org on org.ID = ug.OrganizationID where ui.loginname = #{loginname} or ui.username=#{loginname}

select
from UserInfo ui inner join UserOrganization ug on ui.UserID = ug.UserID inner join Organization org on org.ID = ug.OrganizationID where ui.UserID = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select ui.* from UserInfo ui where ui.UserID = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select
from UserInfo ui inner join UserOrganization ug on ui.UserID = ug.UserID inner join Organization org on org.ID = ug.OrganizationID where ui.UserName=#{username} and ui.Loginname=#{loginname} and ui.Password=#{password}
mapper.insert: insert into UserInfo (UserID, LoginName, PassWord, UserName, NickName, Gender, PersonID, Education, Marriage, Phone, CourseID, MiniRoleID, MemberID, GiftName, GroupID, CreateDate, CardID, IsBaptism, BaptismDate, JoinChurchDate, NativePlace, CurrentAddress, Speciality, AssistantGrouper, ProfessionName, ContributionNO, IsDelete, OtherGroupID, Birthday, Barcode, WeChatName, Description) values (#{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{loginname,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{username,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{nickname,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{gender,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{personid,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{education,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{marriage,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{courseid,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{miniroleid,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{memberid,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{giftname,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{groupid,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{cardid,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{isbaptism,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{baptismdate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{joinchurchdate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{nativeplace,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{currentaddress,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{speciality,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{assistantgrouper,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{professionname,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{contributionno,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{isdelete,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{othergroupid,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{birthday,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{barcode,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{wechatname,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=NVARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update UserInfo
LoginName = #{loginname,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
PassWord = #{password,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
UserName = #{username,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
NickName = #{nickname,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
Gender = #{gender,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
PersonID = #{personid,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
Education = #{education,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
Marriage = #{marriage,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
Phone = #{phone,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
CourseID = #{courseid,jdbcType=CHAR},
MiniRoleID = #{miniroleid,jdbcType=CHAR},
MemberID = #{memberid,jdbcType=CHAR},
GiftName = #{giftname,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
GroupID = #{groupid,jdbcType=CHAR},
CreateDate = #{createdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CardID = #{cardid,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
IsBaptism = #{isbaptism,jdbcType=INTEGER},
BaptismDate = #{baptismdate,jdbcType=DATE},
JoinChurchDate = #{joinchurchdate,jdbcType=DATE},
NativePlace = #{nativeplace,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
CurrentAddress = #{currentaddress,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
Speciality = #{speciality,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
AssistantGrouper = #{assistantgrouper,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
ProfessionName = #{professionname,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
ContributionNO = #{contributionno,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
IsDelete = #{isdelete,jdbcType=INTEGER},
OtherGroupID = #{othergroupid,jdbcType=CHAR},
Birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
Barcode = #{barcode,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
WeChatName = #{wechatname,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
Description = #{description,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
where UserID = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update UserInfo set LoginName = #{loginname,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, PassWord = #{password,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, UserName = #{username,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, NickName = #{nickname,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, Gender = #{gender,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, PersonID = #{personid,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, Education = #{education,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, Marriage = #{marriage,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, Phone = #{phone,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, CourseID = #{courseid,jdbcType=CHAR}, MiniRoleID = #{miniroleid,jdbcType=CHAR}, MemberID = #{memberid,jdbcType=CHAR}, GiftName = #{giftname,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, GroupID = #{groupid,jdbcType=CHAR}, CreateDate = #{createdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CardID = #{cardid,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, IsBaptism = #{isbaptism,jdbcType=INTEGER}, BaptismDate = #{baptismdate,jdbcType=DATE}, JoinChurchDate = #{joinchurchdate,jdbcType=DATE}, NativePlace = #{nativeplace,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, CurrentAddress = #{currentaddress,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, Speciality = #{speciality,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, AssistantGrouper = #{assistantgrouper,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, ProfessionName = #{professionname,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, ContributionNO = #{contributionno,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, IsDelete = #{isdelete,jdbcType=INTEGER}, OtherGroupID = #{othergroupid,jdbcType=CHAR}, Birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, Barcode = #{barcode,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, WeChatName = #{wechatname,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, Description = #{description,jdbcType=NVARCHAR} where UserID = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
